entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Snow beginning before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow becoming mixed with periods of rain in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 before morning. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
